name: Le Café
description:
This whole game was made using only AI-generated art (Stable Diffusion). The point of the game is to serve dessert orders to customers. You'd have to guess the names of the desserts, but I'm sure you'll get the hang of them quickly. This is a small project that I wanted to try. Art has always been a problem for me but with the recent developments in AI making assets has become super easy. 

Enjoy!
